name: Find the Mage Quest1
description:
Your main mission is to follow the black mage, and prevert him from killing the green world.

I woudlike to know, is anyone is intrested with the idea and the game currectly state;

I set a 5euro donation option, cuz if you are interested in the game, please support me so that I can develop it further

i Will update the game every 2 weeks
